name: Gas Match Prototype
description:
A poototype where you fart to kill your opponents. Play between 2 to 4 players in 3 different modes.

If you enjoy the game, do consider buying the game here or spreading the news to your friends.

Or you could just leave us your comments, critiques, and feedback. We'd love to hear them!

Credits:

Programming: WY Leong (http://wyleong.tumblr.com)

Art: Mok (http://monosattva.tumblr.com)
